block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
American Equity Investment Life Holding, 13 million shares. Friedman, Billings, Ramsey and Raymond James.
Beacon Roofing Supply, 8.75 million shares. J. P. Morgan and William Blair.
Boulder Specialty Brands Inc., 17 million shares. Citigroup and Roth Capital.
Buy.com 4.16 million shares. Thomas Weisel and Stifel Nicolaus.
Ceradyne, 1.8 million shares. Citigroup, Needham and Wachovia.
Copa Holdings, 14 million shares. Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs.
DealerTrack Holdings, 10 million shares. Lehman Brothers and J. P. Morgan.
Directed Electronics, 9.37 million shares. Goldman Sachs and J. P. Morgan.
Dril-Quip Inc., three million shares. UBS and Morgan Stanley.
Emergency Medical Services, 7.8 million shares. Banc of America Securities and J. P. Morgan.
Herbalife Ltd., 10 million shares. Merrill Lynch and Morgan Stanley.
IDT Spectrum, 4.16 million shares. W. R. Hambrecht.
Lionbridge Technologies, 9.4 million shares. Goldman Sachs and Friedman, Billings, Ramsey.
McCormick & Schmick's Seafood Restaurants, 5.08 million shares. Banc of America Securities and Wachovia.
Packaging Corporation of America, 15.5 million shares. Goldman Sachs and J. P. Morgan.
Perini, 5.04 million shares. UBS.
Pixelplus, 4.5 million shares. Jefferies.
Republic Property Trust, 20 million shares. Lehman Brothers and Bear Stearns.
Scopus Video Networks, 4.5 million shares. Thomas Weisel and CIBC World Markets.
Somaxon Pharmaceuticals, five million shares. Morgan Stanley and J. P. Morgan.
Spansion, 39.2 million shares. Citigroup and Credit Suisse First Boston.
Suntech Power Holdings, 26.4 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston and Morgan Stanley.
Voyager Pharmaceutical, 4.5 million shares. W. R. Hambrecht.
(Source by MCM EquityWatch)
